billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Relates to a report on the capacity and staffing of the state prison system
summary: Requires certain reports to be provided to the legislature regarding correctional facilities, especially evaluating the capacity and staffing of the state prison system.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring certain reports to the legislature regarding correctional facilities
